doc.title: Love Is Blind
doc.plot: Marigold doesn't expect to run into David Gulac in the halls, after all, she has Steve. But when she lays eyes on David, her future with Steve is over. There is just one thing, David can't lay eyes on her. He's blind. Orange wants to be loved. That is all she has ever asked for, all she has ever wanted. David Gulac seems like the perfect solution to her boyfriendless world, he's blind. And, after all, if a blind guy can't see how ugly she is, she at least has a chance to prove to him how beautiful she is... on the inside. Steve, however, falls into a pit of depression after Marigold breaks things off with him... what can he do now, but mope? Destiny will play its role and each of them will get exactly what they need: Love.
